# Interface MemorySnapshotInterface

Interface for memory snapshot initialization. Represents a complete state of agent memory at a point in time.

interface MemorySnapshotInterface {  
flashMemory?: [FlashMemoryInterface](./primitives_memory_flash_memory.FlashMemoryInterface);  
longTermMemory?: [LongTermMemoryInterface](./primitives_memory_long_term_memory.LongTermMemoryInterface);  
rollingSummary?: [RollingSummaryInterface](./primitives_memory_rolling_summary.RollingSummaryInterface);  
}

##### Index

### Properties

flashMemory? longTermMemory? rollingSummary?

## Properties

### `Optional`flashMemory

flashMemory?: [FlashMemoryInterface](./primitives_memory_flash_memory.FlashMemoryInterface)

Optional flash memory configuration

### `Optional`longTermMemory

longTermMemory?: [LongTermMemoryInterface](./primitives_memory_long_term_memory.LongTermMemoryInterface)

Optional long-term memory configuration

### `Optional`rollingSummary

rollingSummary?: [RollingSummaryInterface](./primitives_memory_rolling_summary.RollingSummaryInterface)

Optional rolling summary configuration
